issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Event 'update' in Ti.Accelerometer works similar as 'shake' event in Ti.Gesture. This event fired only when device is shaking. It have to fire after any position change of device. Run example on iPhone: [http://b.rwd.me/].
Look at: [link|http://www.sencha.com/forum/showthread.php?116815-DeviceOrientation-and-DeviceMotion-fun]
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Event 'update' in Ti.Accelerometer works incorrect
